text: @WHO @WHOWPRO @WHOSEARO @WHO_Europe @WHOEMRO @WHOAFRO @pahowho Cold weather and it’s effect on Corona virus isn’t a concern. It’s whether warmer weather can help suppress the virus. Virus has been proven to live in frozen parts of the world for very long times..
